dialogue.speech: Dad, it's already started!<0
This is bad.<0

Even as strong as Eyvale is,
these are imperial soldiers...Let's go.<1
Oh man.<1
Dagda!? You came?<0
Oh, Eyvale, thank goodness you're alright.<0

Does that kid have something to do with why
imperial soldiers have come all the way out here?<0

Yeah, actually, that kid is the prince
of the fallen Leonster kingdom.<0

I've been sheltering him, sorry for keeping
it from you.<0
I figured it was something like that.<0

Well, it's fine.
As long as I get to fight imperial soldiers,
I won't complain.<1

Mareeta and Nanna were taken by the
imperial soldiers.<0
Hurry, you have to save them before it's too late.<0

Oh, before you go, take this magic bracelet with
you. I think it will be useful.<0

But just holding it isn't enough.
You have to use it.<1
You've all returned! Thank goodness...<0
The village, please save the village!<0
Here...Take this medicine, please.<0

No, it's fine. Eyvale has done so much for us,
this hardly compares...<1

We can't afford to replace weapons because
of the high cost.<0

I hate to say it, but capturing an enemy and
taking their weapons is a good idea.<0

Look here, I took this from one of the
imperial soldiers.<0

...I took it from him while he was sleeping.
Hohoho.<0
If you want this piece of junk, it's yours.<0

If you don't need it, you can sell it to the
shop over there. Should earn you a bit of money.<1
Ah, big brother! I have something good for you.<0
This should be useful, right?<0

?
...This axe?<0
It's a good looking axe, isn't it?<0

Awhile back, while I was walking in the hills,
a strange old lady came out of the lake
and gave it to me.<0

But I don't really have a use for an axe,
so I'm giving it to you.<1

Have you seen Halvan, my brother?
I hope he's doing alright...<1

Damn it Orthin, where are you off to now?
That useless boy!<1

Orthin, are you serious?
You had better not be getting in Lady Eyvale's way.<0

Get off my back old man.
I don't want another lecture.<0

Some son I have,
your mouth is the only thing that has grown up.<0
Well, come here. This is for you.<0

Ah, thank you very much.
I can't relax without this axe in my hands.<0

Honestly, you're such a forgetful guy.
Who's ever heard of someone going off to war
and forgetting their own weapon?<0

Tch,
Here comes another lecture.<0

Hmph.
Well, hurry up and go help Lady Eyvale.<0
You don't need to tell me that!<1

Hey, is that Tania?
What are you doing here?<0

Orthin!?
What does it look like I'm doing?
I came here to help.<0

"Came here to help"?
You're not going to be of any help to us.<0
Go home kid, go on, get.<0

K-kid?! You're the kid!
You don't have to tell me to leave, I'm leaving!<0

Who would want to come to a place like this on
purpose you jerk!<1
Have you found the Prince?<0

No, we've looked all over the village,
but still haven't found him.<0

Fool!
What is taking so long?<0

There is no doubt the survivors of the
Kingdom of Leonster are hiding here.<0
Bring the villagers to heel and make them talk!<0

Yes my Lord, of course.
However, it seems like they really are not here.<0

The villagers say the Prince and the
Fianna Freeblades went to help a village
that was being tormented by pirates.<0

Fianna Freeblades?
Huh?
Who are they?<0

This village was originally a bandit stronghold.
Then, ten years ago, a travelling mercenary named
Eyvale put down the bandits and took
control of the area.<0

Now they call themselves the Freeblades,
and protect the nearby villages.
From what I hear, she is a fairly capable woman...<0

Hmm...
That could be a small problem.<0
No need to worry.<0
We have taken Eyvale's daughter hostage.<0

Additionally, we have also captured the daughter
of the Prince's protector, the knight Finn.
They won't be able to oppose us like this.<0

Ho.
I've underestimated you.<0

Alright,
I'll take the girls back with me to Manster.<0

You remain here and wait for those
rebels to return. When the Prince returns,
capture him no matter what!<0
Yes, my Lord, leave it to me.<0

Someone!
Bring the girls here!<1
What's your name, girl?<0
Hmph...<0
Ha, it's charming you still have a stubborn side.<0
Now the other one...<0

Oh, you're Finn's daughter?
Seems your mother is Nordian royalty.<0

As expected, you can't deny your blood,
even out here you haven't lost your elegance.<0

Fu fu fu, you've brought me an unexpected present.
Right, I will return to Manster.<0
Weissman, I leave the rest to you!<0
Yes, my Lord!<1

What's this?
Something is strange here...<0

I'll go take a look Commander.
Wait here a moment.<1

Captain, the village is filled with imperial
soldiers! They must have attacked while
we were away!<0

What?!
Dammit, those imperial bastards are making
us look like fools!<0
Captain,<512 let's hurry to the village!<0

Halvan, how can you be so calm?!
The village is under attack!<0
I agree with Halvan. Orthin, please calm down.<0

Prince Leif, it seems like the empire
has found you.<0
I'm sorry, but this is farewell.<0

We'll distract the imperial soldiers,
please use that time to get as far
away as possible.<501 Finn, you go with the Prince...<4

Eyvale!
Nanna is in the village,
there's no way I can just run away!<0
You don't need to worry Leif, I'll rescue Nanna.<0

No, it's not that.
I've decided I'm done running away.<0

Finn,<501 what do you think?
Are you alright exposing the Prince to this danger?<0

The Prince is already 15 years old.
He has made his choice.<0
As his retainer, I will follow his orders.<0

15 years old, huh...
I also had him accompany me in the suppresion
of the pirates.<0

Very well.
It is as Finn says.
I was wrong to object.<0

...I don't fully understand what you're all
talking about, but if you're done talking
let's hurry and go!<0

Alright, but be careful.
These lower grade imperial soldiers are citizens
who have been forcibly conscripted.<0

If possible, it would be good to capture them
without killing them, and let them go after
disarming them.<0

But we can still beat them until they surrender
right? Otherwise we'll be the ones who get hurt.
<0

Yeah, that's fine, but only fight back as much
as you can without killing them.<0
Orthin, you in particular need to be careful.<0
Tsk, do you not trust me?<0

Let's go.
Everyone, do the name of the Fianna Freeblades
proud.<1
Nanna! Mareeta! Where are you? Say something!<0
It seems Baron Reydrick has taken them.<0
What!? Where? To Manster?<0

Probably. It seems Reydrick
intends to use keep them as hostages...<0

Damn...Eyvale, let's go after them.
We have to save them!<0
Prince Leif...<0
Eyvale, they were taken because of me.<0

I am not a child anymore.
I don't want to live my life by sacrificing others.<0
...Understood. We'll set out tomorrow morning.<0
It will be a difficult trip, so rest well tonight.<0
Thanks for playing!<0
Press the enter key to return to the main menu.<1
Nanna! Mareeta! Where are you? Say something!<0
Oh, Prince Leif, are you alright?<0

I'm sorry, while you were woried about all of
us, Nanna was...<0
Nanna was what? What happened to her?<0
She was captured by the imperial soliders.<0
Lady Mareeta tried her best to save her,<0
but she was captured as well...<0
Where were they taken after that?<0
I'm afraid I don't know...<0

Oh, come to think of it, one of the soldiers
outside said something about "returning to
Manster".<0
Manster. I see. Okay, don't worry.<0

Nanna, and Mareeta, and Eyvale too.
I'll get everyone back!<0
Thanks for playing!<0
Press the enter key to return to the main menu.<1
